Karin Schimke (amụrụ ya na 1968) bụ onye odee South Africa
O nwetala ihe nrite maka uri ya na ntụgharị asụsụ ya
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye edemede na onye nchịkọta akụkọ.
A mụrụ Karin Schimke n'afọ 1968 na Pretoria, South Africa site na nna German na nne Afrikaans
Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Clapham na Queenswood tupu ọ gaa mụọ asụsụ na Mahadum Pretoria

O nwetara akara ugo mmụta postgraduate na nta akụkọ sitere na Mahadum Stellenbosch wee malite ọrụ ide ya n'afọ 1991, na-arụ ọrụ dị ka onye nta akụkọ ozi na-asụ asụsụ abụọ na Die Eikestadnuus, akwụkwọ akụkọ obodo na-enweta ihe nrite na Stellenbosch
Ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ oge niile dị ka onye nta akụkọ maka The Argus n'afọ sochirinụ
Ọ nọrọ afọ abụọ na-arụ ọrụ na The Star na Johannesburg mana ọ nọrọla ọtụtụ oge ndụ ya na Cape Town.
Schimke rụrụ ọrụ na ụfọdụ akwụkwọ akụkọ kacha ukwuu na South Africa gụnyere The Argus, The Star na The Cape Times, dị ka onye nta akụkọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, tupu ya agawa onwe ya na 2000
Ọ laghachiri na The Cape Times afọ ise dị ka onye na-edezi ibe akwụkwọ nweere onwe ya site n'afọ 2010 ruo afọ 2015.

Schimke enyela aka n'ọtụtụ akwụkwọ akụkọ na akwụkwọ akụkọ gụnyere Mail & Guardian, Daily Maverick, The Sunday Times, Marie Claire, Visi, Elle, Financial Mail, Business Day, African Mkpebi, The Argus, The Star, The Cape Times, Akụkọ, Fair Lady, Ezigbo Mfe, Ndụ Elu na Psychologies
Ọ bụ onye na-ede akụkọ ọchị maka akwụkwọ akụkọ Femina, yana maka Parent24

Na 2006, Schimke kwadoro akwụkwọ akụkọ kacha mma, Fabulously 40 na karịa: na-abata n'ike gị ma nabata mgbanwe,  ya na Margie Orford na akwụkwọ ọhụrụ ya, Akwụkwọ Karen nke Iwu (NB Publishers)  ya na onye edemede na-atọ ọchị bụ Karen
Jeynes,  ka ewepụtara na Septemba 2020
Nchịkọta abụ mbụ nke Schimke, Bare & Breaking ( Akwụkwọ Modjaji ),  ka ebipụtara n'afọ 2012
Nchịkọta ahụ meriri Ingrid Jonker Prize n'afọ 2014
Mpịakọta nke abụọ ya, Navigate
( Modjaji Books ), e bipụtara n'afọ 2017
O meela uri nke ya na Woordfees, Badilisha Poetry X-Change,  na Klein Karoo Nasionale Kunstefee na uri-on-the-road na Bremen,  Germany, na pọdkastị dị iche iche na ajụjụ ọnYụ redio

Ebipụtala ọrụ ya na New Coin, New Contrast, Stanzas na Carapace  wee gosipụta ya na akwụkwọ akụkọ Paris Lit Up, The Atlanta Review, Mslexia, yana nchịkọta uri sitere na South Africa nke a sụgharịrị n'asụsụ German, nke a na-akpọ Ankunft
eines weiteren Tages,  nke Afrika Wunderhorn bipụtara

N'afọ 2019, Schimke, ya na Leon de Kock, meriri ihe nrite nke afọ 2019 Sol Plaatje Translation Award  maka Flame in the Snow, ntụgharị bekee nke Vlam in die Sneeu, mkpokọta akwụkwọ ozi ịhụnanya edere n'afọ 1960 n'etiti onye na-ede akwụkwọ akụkọ André Brink na onye na-ede uri Ingrid Jonker
Ọ na-atụgharịkarị ọrụ nke onye ode akwụkwọ egwu Afrịka ama ama bụ Irma Venter.
Schimke deziri Open  ( Oshun, Struik, 2008) nchịkọta edemede mkparị ụmụ nwanyị sitere n'aka ụfọdụ ndị ode akwụkwọ nwanyị kacha elu South Africa
Ọ deziela ọrụ ndị odee South Africa ama ama dị ka Martin Steyn,  Chanette Paul,  Dov Fedler  na Bronwyn Davids
Schimke bụ onye nchịkwa na-ede akwụkwọ,  onye nchịkọta akụkọ mmepe, onye mmepụta ihe na onye ndụmọdụ.
'Anyị niile nwere mwute.' Ajụjụ ọnụ Robert A
Hamblin
Maverick kwa ụbọchị June 2021
